item.description: Handy Git Cheatsheet ğŸ”§ Basic Commands git init â€“ Initialize a new Git repository. git clone <repo_url> â€“ Clone a remote repository. git status â€“ Check the status of your working directory. git add <file> â€“ Stage changes for commit. git commit -m "message" â€“ Commit staged changes with a message. git push â€“ Push your local commits to the remote repository. git pull â€“ Fetch and merge changes from the remote repo.
